name: Cherry - Blossem Demo
description:
Cherry is a lonley elf till one day she meets an weird guy in the pub, this is where her story starts. she has to fight 8 demons that serve Blossem wich she thought she killed 5 years ago! it does not help that she is an arrogant elf who only cares about her self!

Help cherry and meet friends on the way in Cherry - Blossen

feedback is always welcome!

Full release date not know yet!
